text: Tomadera ke'u pachanda kare ye, tara ekati khejura o angurera bagana habe, era taladesa diye nahara prabahita habe, ara ete sarbaprakara phala-phasala thakabe ebam se bardhakye pauchabe, tara durbala santana santati'o thakabe, ematabasthaya e baganera ekati ghurnibayu asabe, yate aguna rayeche, anantara baganati bhasmibhuta haye yabe? Emanibhabe allaha taâ€™ala tomadera jan'ye nidarsanasamuha barnana karena-yate tomara cinta-bhabana kara.
